document.full_text: ivory coast's laurent gbagbo was overthrown by ivorians, not by foreign powers, the united nations said on thursday amid rising criticism of its role in the removal of the former leader.
document.title: u.n. defends role in ivory coast gbagbo ouster
lines_and_colors: ivory coast's laurent gbagbo was overthrown by ivorians, not by foreign powers, the united nations said on thursday amid rising criticism of its role in the removal of the former leader.
